languages.text: "Не-фенрисийцу трудно постичь нашу мудрость. Она приходит с холодом и смертью".
"It is difficult for non-Fenrisians to grasp our wisdom. It comes along with the cold and death."
languages.original_text: "Не-фенрисийцу трудно постичь нашу мудрость. Она приходит с холодом и смертью".

traits.locale_text: "It is difficult for non-Fenrisians to grasp our wisdom. It comes along with the cold and death."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is difficult for non-Fenrisians to grasp our wisdom. It comes along with the cold and death."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is difficult for non-Fenrisians to grasp our wisdom. It comes along with the cold and death."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is difficult for non-Fenrisians to grasp our wisdom. It comes along with the cold and death."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “不在芬里斯长大的人，很难理解我们的智慧。我们的智慧伴随着寒冷与死亡而来。”
languages.original_text: "It is difficult for non-Fenrisians to grasp our wisdom. It comes along with the cold and death."

traits.locale_text: “不在芬里斯长大的人，很难理解我们的智慧。我们的智慧伴随着寒冷与死亡而来。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Es difícil que alguien que no sea de Fenris entienda nuestra sabiduría. Viene acompañando al frío y a la muerte».
languages.original_text: "It is difficult for non-Fenrisians to grasp our wisdom. It comes along with the cold and death."

traits.locale_text: «Es difícil que alguien que no sea de Fenris entienda nuestra sabiduría. Viene acompañando al frío y a la muerte».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「フェンリスの民以外には、俺達の知恵を理解するのは難しい。それは寒さと死とともにやってくる」
languages.original_text: "It is difficult for non-Fenrisians to grasp our wisdom. It comes along with the cold and death."

traits.locale_text: 「フェンリスの民以外には、俺達の知恵を理解するのは難しい。それは寒さと死とともにやってくる」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Nicht-Fenrisianer können unsere Weisheit nur schwer begreifen. Sie geht mit der Kälte und dem Tod einher."
languages.original_text: "It is difficult for non-Fenrisians to grasp our wisdom. It comes along with the cold and death."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht-Fenrisianer können unsere Weisheit nur schwer begreifen. Sie geht mit der Kälte und dem Tod einher."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Les non Fenrissiens peinent à appréhender notre sagesse. Elle vient avec le froid et la mort. »
languages.original_text: "It is difficult for non-Fenrisians to grasp our wisdom. It comes along with the cold and death."

traits.locale_text: « Les non Fenrissiens peinent à appréhender notre sagesse. Elle vient avec le froid et la mort. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "It is difficult for non-Fenrisians to grasp our wisdom. It comes along with the cold and death."

languages.text: "Fenrisli olmayanlar için bizim bilgeliğimizi anlamak zordur. Bu bilgelik, soğuk ve ölümle kol kola gelir."
languages.original_text: "It is difficult for non-Fenrisians to grasp our wisdom. It comes along with the cold and death."

traits.locale_text: "Fenrisli olmayanlar için bizim bilgeliğimizi anlamak zordur. Bu bilgelik soğuk ve ölümle kol kola gelir."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
